alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:52AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL ST. JOHNS COUNTY THROUGH 730 AM EDT... At 652 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vilano Beach, or near Saint Augustine, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, and Anastasia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
